name: Glitch Garden (Nicolas Ayllon)
description:
This is a tower defense game I made as part of a course "Complete C# Unity Developer 2D" on udemy.com, featuring:

  • 10 levels of increasing difficulty
  • New attackers & defenders show up as the game progresses
  • Pause & autosave

I used the following free resources:

  • Art, Animation, & Music:  Glitch (MMO from 2009-2012)
  • Game Field Image: provided by the Unity 2D course
  • Font: Funky Junk

Note: The Quit button doesn't do anything.
